entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022
